title: Jolly Beans Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A spacious independent coffee shop uses locally roasted beans. Vegans can get soy, almond, and coconut milk in their fruit smoothies. Has a vegetarian menu with only one clearly labeled vegan item (a breakfast bagel). Items that can be made vegan upon request include a Tofurky sandwich, bbq soyriso panini and grilled cheese, among a few others. Has ample indoor and outdoor seating. Located in Solista Park.
